column4: hey, i'm trying to install opera using synaptic package manager but i keep getting "Depends: xlib6g (>=3.3.6) but it is not installable or
xlibs  but it is not installable" error
check Opera's forums, there's a howto there - you have to grab a deb from Breezy's repos
np. Hopefully Opera will come out with a real Dapper deb sometime soon
